lead_paragraph: The International Olympic Committee (IOC) will distribute more than $500 million to national bodies over the next few years, it announced on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: National Olympic Bodies to Get More Than $500 Million
headline.main: National Olympic Bodies to Get More Than $500 Million
